text.english: Oh god. Oh god! No. Please don't tell me this is true!
Calm down. What is it? Tell me what is going on.
Haven't you heard about it yet? It's the plague. THE PLAGUE!
The... plague?
Yes, the plague!
Alright. Stay calm. Stay inside. Stay safe. I can offer to help you and your village out.
That would great! I don't know much about it yet, so I might not be the right person to talk to.
You should go and talk to Ben, the smith. He informed me about the plague yesterday.
Thank you. I will go and talk to him.
No, thank you. Stay safe.
Hello, Ben!
G'day. What can I do for you today?
I have been informed by your friend Wyat that there has been a plague around here in the village.
Oh, so you have heard the news as well. It is so unfortunate, especially during these times...
May I ask what "times" we are talking about?
Oh, right. My friend Dann and I were both doing good business, but because of the Plague people are staying inside of their homes.
His business has always been outstanding, but my business was growing very quickly and was also getting there.
Alright. I will go and talk to Dann and see what he can tell me about the Plague.
Sure. Stay safe!
Busy, busy, busy, busy. I am SO busy!
Ehhm... Sir? May I have a small talk with you for a little bit?
Did you not understand what I was saying? I am extremely busy at the moment!
I have a feeling that can wait. There is currently a Plague spreading around. Were you aware of this?
The Plague?
Oh right! The "Plague". Ha ha ha.
Sorry, but what is so funny about it?
You have missed the news, buddy. I made that entire thing up for the better good.
For the better good? In what world is making up such a story for the better good?
Well... recently my old friend Ben has been growing as a business man and he started growing as a business faster than ever imaginable.
For that reason, I had to come up with something to have him not take over MY business.
I told the entire village there was a Plague spreading around so nobody would come to his business.
*whispers* Pathetic
Sorry, what did you say?
Nothing. Forget about it.
Don't you think there is a better solution for this sort of competition between businesses?
Oh yes. I believe there are many solutions, but this was the first one that came to mind.
Then why don't we think of another solution and convince the village that the Plague was fake?
Sounds like a plan. As long as it does not bother my business, of course.
We can figure something out. What are your thoughts?
This might sound very strange, but I heard that people get convinced easily if you give them some food and something to drink before trying to convince them of something.
That is indeed very strange. Anyway, I believe you.
What kind of food and drink are we talking about?
I believe a nice warm mushroom stew and fresh milk will do.
Alright. I will take a loot at it and see if I can convince Ben that the Plague is fake.
Good to see you again. Have you heard anything new about the Plague?
Yes. I believe it is fake.
Fake? I am unsure whether I have to believe what you are saying. Please go look for more information about it.
Good to see you again, Ben!
While I was wondering around trying to get some information, I have found this mushroom stew and milk. Would you like some?
I cannot say no to that! Thank you very much.
So the Plague, huh? Have you been able to find more information about it?
Actually, yes. I have been talking to your friend Dann. He told me the truth about it all.
He told me that he was jealous when he saw that your business was growing. So then he began spreading fake news that there was a virus among the villagers.
With that, he was hoping that your business would not get many customers, because they would be afraid to go outside.
By talking with him, we both agreed to come with a better solution to still be friends and continue with the competition in a non-childish way.
Wow. I did not think he would go that far. I am sure he is willing to work this out, but that is a whole other story.
Thank you for figuring this out for me. Now I can go continue and work on the growth of my business again.
You might want to talk to Wyat again and tell him as well that the Plague is fake.
I will certainly do that.
Wyat, I have good news.
I know. I have heard the news already. It spreads even faster than an actual virus would. Ha ha ha.
Thank you for calming down the village by figuring out what was going on.
For that reason, take this mushroom stew and milk as a reward. I still had it hanging around somewhere.
